Folder View

"This is one of the most useful tools I've seen lately. Working with folders became MUCH faster than before."

Download

The size of the setup file is about 1.1 MB:

Download

After the download is complete, simply execute the downloaded file to start the setup and follow the instructions. Folder View is freeware.

System requirements

Folder View doesn't need a powerful system to work and will work on new and older computers:

  • Windows: XP/2000/ME or 98/95 with Internet Explorer 5 or above installed
  • 16 MB internal memory (32 MB recommended), or as much as the operating system requires.
  • 3 MB diskspace
  • 486 compatible processor (Pentium-compatible or comparable recommended)
